title: Leap
description: Leap is the codename for this website. It's a single page app built using Vue.js and styled with TailwindCSS.

title: Sunny
description: This is my attempt at making a simple weather app. I used Pirate Weather's API to get the weather data. The app is built using Vue.js and Ionic with Capacitor to build natively on Android.

title: Krypton
description: Krypton is a password generator build using Electron. It uses Node.js's crypto module to generate cryptographically secure random numbers to generate a password.

title: PGen
summary: My first attempt at a password generator
description: This was my first attempt at a password generator. It's a Windows Forms application that utilizes a cryptographically secure random number generator to generate a secure password from various sets of characters toggleable by the user. Some Unicode characters are also supported.
